title: Is ChatGPT down in the US? Thousands of users report outage after being unable to send messages
snippet: OpenAI's ChatGPT experienced an outage in the United States, with over 3,200 users reporting issues on Downdetector, unable to ask new questions to the chatbot.

title: Oakley Meta Vanguard smart glasses for athletes launched in India: Price, features and more
snippet: Oakley and Meta have launched the Oakley Meta Vanguard, AI-powered performance smart glasses built for athletes, featuring fitness tracking, hands-free 3K video capture, open-ear audio, Hindi voice support and IP67 water resistance, starting at  ₹52,300 in India.

title: New Firefox settings put AI control back in users’ hands: Here's how
snippet: Mozilla will add a centralised AI control hub to Firefox 148, letting users enable or disable individual features or opt out of generative AI entirely. The update aims to give people greater choice and control over tools like translations, tab grouping and the built in chatbot.

title: Elon Musk calls Spain PM Pedro Sánchez ‘tyrant and traitor’ over under-16 social media ban
snippet: Spain plans to ban social media access for children under 16 to protect them from harmful online content, as announced by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez. The initiative aligns with similar measures in countries like Australia and France, emphasising the need for effective age verification systems.

title: X offices in Paris searched by French cybercrime, Elon Musk told to appear before authorities
snippet: On Tuesday, french prosecutors raided X’s Paris offices as part of a criminal probe into alleged child abuse content, explicit deepfakes, Holocaust denial and algorithm manipulation, summoning Elon Musk and former CEO Linda Yaccarino for questioning while Europol assists the investigation.

title: Geoff Keighley confirms date for The Game Awards 2026 in Los Angeles: All you need to know
snippet: The Game Awards 2026 will take place on 10 December in Los Angeles, with Geoff Keighley hosting the annual celebration of gaming’s biggest titles. Major releases, including GTA 6, could compete depending on the eligibility deadline, setting up a fiercely contested year.

title: 10 gaming laptops under  ₹80,000 I would trust for smooth and serious gaming
snippet: These gaming laptops under  ₹80,000 balance strong GPUs, fast processors and cooling, making them reliable picks for smooth gameplay, creative work and long sessions.

title: Nvidia nears deal to invest $20 billion in OpenAI funding round: Report
snippet: Nvidia ‍CEO Jensen Huang ‍told CNBC earlier in the day ‌that the company would consider investing in OpenAI's next fundraising round and the startup's eventual IPO, following recent reports that the deal ‍had stalled.

title: US files appeal in Google search antitrust case
snippet: A federal court judge in Washington in 2024 ruled Google has a monopoly in ‌the online ‌search business, but rejected the toughest remedies.

title: PayPal replaces CEO Chriss with HP's Lores
snippet: Lores has served as a PayPal board member for almost five years and has been board Chair since July 2024. He's also spent more than six years as president and CEO of HP Inc.

title: Alphabet plans major India expansion as US tightens visa rules: Report
snippet: The company has leased one ‌office tower ‌and purchased options on two others in Alembic City, a development in the city's ‌Whitefield tech corridor, totaling 2.4 million square feet, the report said, citing people familiar with the deal.
